mapper.select: select m.*, s.success_board_id, s.success_board_contents, s.likecount, s.views, s.board_register_date from mod_missionstate m, mod_successboard s where m.mission_state_id=s.mission_state_id order by s.board_register_date desc

select m.*, s.success_board_id, s.success_board_contents, s.likecount, s.views, s.board_register_date from mod_missionstate m, mod_successboard s where m.mission_state_id=s.mission_state_id order by s.likecount desc
select distinct c.large_category from mod_missioncategory c where c.large_category like '%'||#{searchCategory}||'%'
select distinct c.* from mod_missioncategory c where c.large_category like '%'||#{searchCategory}||'%'
select distinct c.* from mod_missioncategory c where c.small_category like '%'||#{searchCategory}||'%'

select m.*, s.success_board_id, s.success_board_contents, s.likecount, s.views, s.board_register_date from mod_missionstate m, mod_successboard s where m.mission_state_id=s.mission_state_id and m.user_nickname=#{searchUser} order by s.board_register_date desc

select * from mod_successboard s left outer join mod_missionstate m on s.mission_state_id = m.mission_state_id left outer join mod_missioninfo i on i.mission_info_id = s.mission_info_id left outer join mod_missioncategory c on c.mission_category_id= i.mission_category_id where c.large_category like '%'||#{searchCategory}||'%' or c.small_category like '%'||#{searchCategory}||'%'

select mission_title, large_category, small_category from mod_successboard s left outer join mod_missioninfo i on s.mission_info_id = i.mission_info_id left outer join mod_missioncategory c on i.mission_category_id = c.mission_category_id where s.success_board_id=#{success_board_id}
select profile_picture, u.user_nickname from mod_users u, mod_successboard s where u.user_nickname = s.user_nickname and s.success_board_id=#{success_board_id}
select upload_video, upload_image, mission_upload_contents from mod_missionstate m, mod_successboard s where m.mission_state_id = s.mission_state_id and s.success_board_id=#{success_board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into mod_reply(reply_id,success_board_id,user_nickname,reply_contents,reference) values('reply'||lpad(seq_reply.nextval,5,0), #{success_board_id}, #{user_nickname}, #{reply_contents}, (select count(reply_step) from mod_reply where reply_step=0)+1)
mapper.delete: delete from mod_like where success_board_id=#{success_board_id} and user_nickname=#{user_nickname}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mod_like where success_board_id=#{success_board_id} and user_nickname=#{user_nickname}
mapper.update: update mod_successboard set likecount = (select count(*) from mod_like where success_board_id = #{success_board_id}) where success_board_id = #{success_board_id}
mapper.select: select likecount from mod_successboard where success_board_id = #{success_board_id}
